comment: I had him as a transient student for this summer class and he was the best professor I have ever had. His lectures were clear and always made sense. He did an amazing job explaining the content so I knew how to do the problems on the review before each test. Take him!!

Do not use the internet to assist on learning the exam review problems (you will fail the exams). Overall a good professor but if you don't understand how to exactly do all the review problems the way the professor likes them to be solved you will not pass any exam.
rating_tags: Tough grader--Test heavy--Graded by few things

comment: I had him for Calc 3, and he was great. We had weekly homework and an exam review before each test. If you could complete the review on your own, you would do well on the test. He offers 3 bonus points for missing 3 or fewer classes, so if your final class grade is an 87 after the exam, it could become a 90.
